<title

    right="Feat 1"

>
[Hag's Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=4536) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You’ve nurtured the supernatural abilities gifted by your hag mother, particularly your sight. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Hag's Sight
